sentences: Aydo Abay (born May 29, 1973) is a German singer and songwriter raised in Koblenz, Germany.
Abay is mainly known for being the frontman for the German indie rock quartet Blackmail (1995â€“2008).
He has also started his own solo band project known as "KEN".
